tatami.core.agent.kb.simple

Class SimpleKnowledge

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.agent.kb.simple.SimpleKnowledge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KnowledgeBase.KnowledgeDescription

    public class SimpleKnowledge
extends java.lang.Object
implements KnowledgeBase.KnowledgeDescription
    Simplistic implementation of a KnowledgeBase.KnowledgeDescription.

    It represents a knowledge structure: it has knowledge type, and an ArrayList of String.

    Author:
    Nguyen Thi Thuy Nga, Andrei Olaru

      • getTextRepresentation

        public java.lang.String getTextRepresentation()
        Description copied from interface: KnowledgeBase.KnowledgeDescription
        Returns the text representation of the piece of knowledge described by the object. Should be used by knowledge bases to create / understand pieces of knowledge described by the CLAIM code.

        A particular KnowledgeBase -implementing class can use its own KnowledgeBase.KnowledgeDescription implementation that is not transformable to a text representation, although that is not recommended.

        Specified by:
        getTextRepresentation in interface KnowledgeBase.KnowledgeDescription
        Returns:
        A String representation of the knowledge, that can be implemented by a KnowledgeBase -implementing class.
